What is (are) Connective Tissue Disorders ?,"Connective tissue is the material inside your body that supports many of its parts. It is the ""cellular glue"" that gives your tissues their shape and helps keep them strong. It also helps some of your tissues do their work. Cartilage and fat are examples of connective tissue.
